name: Scavenger vr
description:
This game requires Oculus Quest. If you do not have the device, you cannot use it.

You become a member of the rift investigation team and explore the unknown rift.
Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the dangerous dinosaurs there.
You can hatch dinosaur eggs to create your own dinosaur garden.

You can explore jungle, desert, and swamp areas.

Use capture bullets to collect resources and dinosaur eggs.

Dinosaurs can't see you, but they react to moving objects or sounds.

You can use lures, flashes, and smoke bombs to escape dangerous situations or make gathering easier.

Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!
